alert.note: Alert for Casper Mountain (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued October 11 at 2:34PM MDT until October 13 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THURSDAY TO 6 AM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 12 inches possible above 7,000 feet. Locally higher amounts to 15 inches possible across highest terrain. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Casper Mountain. * WHEN...From 6 AM Thursday to 6 AM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Hunters and others heading into the backcountry should prepare for wet and cold conditions. Heavy, wet snow could make for difficult travel on unpaved mountain roads, especially above 8,000 feet.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
